Frisco.Children's Medical Center Plano:
Children’s Medical Center Plano is a children's hospital located in Plano, Texas, USA. It provides pediatric healthcare for children from birth to age 18. As a branch of the Children's Health system, Children's Medical Center Plano offers care to families across North Texas and beyond in more than 25 specialties. The medical staff includes specialists from UT Southwestern. Children's Medical Center Plano recorded more than 140,000 patient encounters in 2014. The Plano Specialty Center, which is attached to the main hospital, offers the largest suburban group of pediatric specialists in the nation. 
The Children's Health System also includes Children's Medical Center Dallas, as well as seven specialty centers and 19 pediatric primary care offices located throughout North Texas.
